illuminationElevationAngle.description: Illumination elevation measured in degrees clockwise from the target plane at intersection of the optical line of sight with the Earthâ€™s surface. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image.

illuminationAzimuthAngle.description: Illumination azimuth measured in degrees clockwise from true north at the time the image is taken. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

imagingCondition.description: Code which indicates conditions which may affect the image.

cloudCoverPercent.description: Area of the dataset obscured by clouds, expressed as a percentage of the spatial extent.

compressionQuantity.description: Count of the number of lossy compression cycles performed on the image.

triangulationIndicator.description: Indication of whether or not triangulation has been performed upon the image.

radiometricCalibrationAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not the radiometric calibration information for generating the radiometrically calibrated standard data product is available.

cameraCalibrationAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not constants are available which allow for camera calibration corrections.

filmDistortionAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not Calibration Reseau information is available

lensDistortionAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not lens aberration correction information is available.
